What is Pepe ($PEPE)?

Pepe is an Ethereum-based meme coin inspired by the legendary "Pepe the Frog" character, which has entertained internet culture for decades. This token celebrates fun and community within the crypto world. While it doesn’t have utility beyond trading and collecting, its charm and iconic status make it a favorite among meme coin enthusiasts.

Curious about the story behind the Pepe meme? Want to know how PEPE was created and how it’s used? Check out our detailed article on the Pepe meme coin for all the answers!

What is Solana ($SOL)?

Solana is a cutting-edge blockchain platform designed to deliver fast and scalable transactions. It’s home to a vibrant ecosystem of DeFi projects, NFT marketplaces, and decentralized apps. SOL, the platform's native token, is used for transaction fees and staking, making it an integral part of the Solana network.

Want to know more about how Solana works and the role of the SOL token? Check out our detailed article, “What is Solana?”
